overview: A group of people dance at a sports ground to the music of Supertramp. The siblings take flowers to a grave in the deep snow, wearing floral wreaths in their hair. The father directs them. They embrace one another. Memories are invoked by pictures enclosed inside Gabriel's, the brother's, amulet. The mother is dead Â– how will they fill the void she left behind? Each individual family member tries to find their way, is obliged to redefine their course.
title: The White Roses
